bios.name: Race Bannon
bios.bio: Race Bannon is a producer, DJ, and graphic designer for the Cold Collection

bios.name: 96 Sins
bios.bio: 96 sins is an artist/producer and is one of several integral parts of the The Cold Collection. Far from his native land, 96 continues to reimagine the glacial conventions of modern sound with other-worldly melodies and infectious grooves that unearth elusive affectations dormant in the depths of your mind.
